long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
Ultimate Enable Right Click is the most comprehensive, advanced solution for websites that hinder users from using right-click context menus, selecting texts, and copying its contents.

âœ¨ Browse uncluttered with Ultimate Enable Right Click, and never get frustrated again by websites blocking copy.
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

â­ Feature highlights

  â¤ Enable right click, truely bug-free.

 Other similar extensions frequently break websites, so you are forced to disable and activate manually everytime you want to use right click. In contrast, Ultimate Enable Right Click uses a unique, sophisticated technology, which minimizes effect on normal functions of websites which are unrelated to right click, text selection, and copy. Thanks to this, its Javascript-based module could be enabled on all sites by default. No more manual toggles!

  â¤ Can enable copy everywhere, literally.
 
 Compare by yourself with other extensions on our homepage, https://ultimate-enable-right-click.github.io/. Can it enable everything - right click, text highlight, and copy? We have considered every blocking methods web developers may think of, and introduced the most general methodology that takes care of all of it. This is why this extension can reclaim right click, text selection, and copy on literally every websites, even on those which other extensions struggle.

  â¤ Per-site settings, fully customizable

 If you want to turn off the app from certain domains, you can toggle it from the app's popup UI. If you want to temporarily enable the app for a website, use "Run in this session" toggle in the popup UI. View all the settings at a glance with our settings dashboard. Your per-site settings will be synced to your Chrome account!

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ’» How to use

  Â· It enables right click on every websites by default.
  Â· If you want further arsenals for enabling the text selection designed for more stubborn websites, click on the extension's icon, and toggle the Enable text selection(CSS) component.
  Â· For further help, please visit the help page linked at the settings page.

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
Latest patch notes are available at https://github.com/ultimate-enable-right-click/help/blob/master/patch-notes-en.md.
If you have any questions or bug reports, please leave a review, or leave a message at the homepage https://ultimate-enable-right-click.github.io/.

** Ultimative aktivieren Rechtsklick **

Neutralisiert nahtlos das benutzerfeindliche Verhalten der Website. Rechtsklick aktivieren (KontextmenÃ¼s), Textauswahl aktivieren und Kopieren aktivieren (Strg+C).

 
 â€¢ Die einzige Erweiterung, die prÃ¤ventiv Rechtsklick und Kopieren ermÃ¶glicht

 Im Gegensatz zu anderen Ã¤hnlichen Erweiterungen, die den Rechtsklick erst nachtrÃ¤glich freigeben, unterscheidet sich Ultimate Enable Right Click grundlegend, da es verhindert, dass Websites Rechtsklicks oder Kopieren von Anfang an blockieren. Aus diesem Grund kann diese Erweiterung Rechtsklick, Textauswahl und Kopie auf buchstÃ¤blich allen Websites zurÃ¼ckfordern, sogar auf denen, mit denen andere Erweiterungen Probleme haben.

 â€¢ Installieren und vergessen

 Andere Ã¤hnliche Erweiterungen beschÃ¤digen hÃ¤ufig Websites, sodass Sie gezwungen sind, sie manuell zu deaktivieren und zu aktivieren, wenn Sie mit der rechten Maustaste klicken mÃ¶chten. Im Gegensatz dazu verwendet Ultimate Enable Right Click die fortschrittlichste Technologie, die die Auswirkungen auf normale Funktionen von Websites minimiert, die nichts mit Rechtsklick, Textauswahl und Kopieren zu tun haben. Aus diesem Grund ist das Javascript-basierte Modul standardmÃ¤ÃŸig auf allen Websites aktiviert. Kein manuelles Umschalten mehr!

 â€¢ ZusÃ¤tzliche MaÃŸnahmen zum Aktivieren der Drag / Text-Auswahl
 
 Im Gegensatz zu Rechtsklicks, fÃ¼r die das Javascript-basierte Modul der App ausreicht, kÃ¶nnen Websites die Auswahl von Drag & Text nur mit 'CSS' blockieren. Dies ist eine weitere Technologie, die das Web unterstÃ¼tzt. Sie wird auch dann wirksam, wenn Sie JavaScript in Ihrem Browser deaktivieren. Klicken Sie einfach auf das App-Symbol und verwenden Sie "Enable Text Selection (CSS)" fÃ¼r die Site. AnschlieÃŸend kÃ¶nnen Sie ausnahmslos jeden Text auf der Website auswÃ¤hlen.

 â€¢ Einstellungen pro Standort
 
 Wenn Sie die App von bestimmten DomÃ¤nen aus deaktivieren mÃ¶chten, kÃ¶nnen Sie sie Ã¼ber die Popup-BenutzeroberflÃ¤che der App umschalten. Wenn Sie die App vorÃ¼bergehend fÃ¼r eine Website aktivieren mÃ¶chten, aktivieren Sie die Option "In dieser Sitzung ausfÃ¼hren" in der Popup-BenutzeroberflÃ¤che. Benutzerdefinierte Einstellungen pro Site werden mit Ihrem Chrome-Konto synchronisiert!


Besuchen Sie unsere Homepage - https://ultimate-enable-right-click.github.io/
und testen Sie, ob Ihre Erweiterung mit einem Rechtsklick darauf entsperren kann!
Bei Fragen oder Fehlerberichten hinterlassen Sie bitte eine Nachricht im Kommentarfeld auf der Homepage.



----------------------
 Patch Notes
----------------------

2.2.7
 - Now it prevents websites from blocking paste. Certain websites block users from pasting text in a user's clipboard to websites' forms, and the extension will now block it.

2.2.5
 - Resolved conflict of extension UI with browser's built-in dark mode.

2.2.0
 - Added dark mode support for the extension's popup and settings page.

2.1.0
 - Now CSS module can neutralize text selection prevention using `pointer-events` CSS property.

ğŸ‰2.0.0
 - Visit the newly added âœ¨dashboardâœ¨ to view all the settings you have saved at a glance. Click on the gear icon in the extension's popup to open the dashboard.
 - Now a setting for a domain is applied to all of its subdomains. For example, a setting for google.com will now be applied to www.google.com.

1.3.0
 - Now it prevents browser window/tab from being closed while users are right-clicking, selecting text, or dragging objects.

1.2.5
 - Popup UI: Now you can click on the slider bar instead of dragging the slider knob to modify running/stopped state of the extension.

1.2.0
 1. Now it prevents websites from blocking copy & cut functions.
   1) On certain websites, when a user copies selected contents from context menus or by pressing Ctrl+C, nothing is actually copied, an alert window is shown, or some modification is applied to copied contents. Now we prevent such behaviors.
   2) Currently it is under the "Enable right click". To disable it, click on the app's icon and move the slider under the "Enable right click" to the left.

1.1.5
 - Several popup UI improvements.
   - Addressed a frequent user report that slider knobs in the popup UI are hard to distinguish.
 - Launched a Firefox version of the app. It is available for installation in the app's homepage.

1.1.1
 - Updated CSS module to set pointer-events CSS properties. Removed a selector which caused a bug of Chrome.

1.1.0
 - Now it suppresses alert windows while users are right-clicking, selecting text, or dragging objects.

1.0.2
 - Resolved compatibility issues with older versions of Chrome.

Neutraliza a la perfecciÃ³n los comportamientos hostiles del usuario del sitio web. Habilite el clic derecho (menÃºs contextuales), habilite la selecciÃ³n de texto y habilite la copia (Ctrl + C).

La configuraciÃ³n por sitio seleccionada por el usuario se sincroniza con su cuenta de Chrome.

y pruebe si su extensiÃ³n puede desbloquear selecciÃ³n de texto en ella.

2.2.7
 - Now it prevents websites from blocking paste. Certain websites block users from pasting text in a user's clipboard to websites' forms, and the extension will now block it.

2.2.5
 - Resolved conflict of extension UI with browser's built-in dark mode.

2.2.0
 - Added dark mode support for the extension's popup and settings page.

2.1.0
 - Now CSS module can neutralize text selection prevention using `pointer-events` CSS property.

ğŸ‰2.0.0
 - Visit the newly added âœ¨dashboardâœ¨ to view all the settings you have saved at a glance. Click on the gear icon in the extension's popup to open the dashboard.
 - Now a setting for a domain is applied to all of its subdomains. For example, a setting for google.com will now be applied to www.google.com.

1.3.0
 - Now it prevents browser window/tab from being closed while users are right-clicking, selecting text, or dragging objects.

1.2.5
 - Popup UI: Now you can click on the slider bar instead of dragging the slider knob to modify running/stopped state of the extension.

1.2.0
 1. Now it prevents websites from blocking copy & cut functions.
   1) On certain websites, when a user copies selected contents from context menus or by pressing Ctrl+C, nothing is actually copied, an alert window is shown, or some modification is applied to copied contents. Now we prevent such behaviors.
   2) Currently it is under the "Enable right click". To disable it, click on the app's icon and move the slider under the "Enable right click" to the left.

1.1.5
 - Several popup UI improvements.
   - Addressed a frequent user report that slider knobs in the popup UI are hard to distinguish.
 - Launched a Firefox version of the app. It is available for installation in the app's homepage.

1.1.1
 - Updated CSS module to set pointer-events CSS properties. Removed a selector which caused a bug of Chrome.

1.1.0
 - Now it suppresses alert windows while users are right-clicking, selecting text, or dragging objects.

1.0.2
 - Resolved compatibility issues with older versions of Chrome.
